attributes.action: Save Branksome Recreation ground from greedy developers and short sighted Poole Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Poole Council wish to build Poole Town FC new ground upon the only remaining family parkland within the vicinity.

This is an absolute travisty, there are plenty of other alternatives including brown field sites.

The government should be promoting open spaces to promote health and well-being, and also promoting the re-development of brown field sites. Sadly with this proposal, neither is the case.

Please help
